dmca.title: [EV1-C949585V] Subject: DMCA Notification ISP Follow-up - www.wesellcarparts.com / JL
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: Casey McIntosh [mailto:cmcintosh@netenforcers.com] Posted At: Monday, September 18, 2006 11:08 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C949585V] Subject: DMCA Notification ISP Follow-up - www.wesellcarparts.com / JL Audio Subject: RE: [EV1-C949585V] Subject: DMCA Notification ISP Follow-up - www.wesellcarparts.com / JL Audio To Whom it may concern- Attached is a copy of the original letter sent in august regarding www.wesellcarparts.com & our client, JL Audio Thank you for your time regarding these issues. -Casey CMcIntosh@Netenforcers.com -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, September 14, 2006 11:11 AM To: Casey McIntosh Cc: compliance.management@netenforcers.com Subject: FW: [EV1-C949585V] Subject: DMCA Notification ISP Follow-up - www.wesellcarparts.com / JL Audio To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.wesellcarparts.com and our client JL Audio. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 8/9/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 9/18/2006. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at CMcIntosh@Netenforcers.com. Sincerely, Casey McIntosh LMS Representative Net Enforcers Inc. CMcIntosh@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally priveleged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reporduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

 

To whom it may concern,

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.wesellcarparts.com and our client JL Audio. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 8/9/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 9/18/2006. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at CMcIntosh@Netenforcers.com.

 

Sincerely,< o:p>

 

Casey McIntosh

LMS Representative

Net Enforcers Inc.

CMcIntosh@netenforcers.com< /span>

compliance.manageme nt@netenforcers.com

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally priveleged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reporduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

MIME element (text/plain)
